EmailTemplate.name: Gahanna Open House 091411.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly Reminder: You're Registered to Attend the Gahanna Division of Police Open House
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Friendly Reminder Upcoming Gahanna Division of Police Open House
This is a friendly reminder that you are registered to attend the open House and Software Demonstration on Wednesday, September 14th from 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM at the Gahanna Division of Police.
You will get an inside look at Gahanna Division of Police opeartions using TriTechs' Imc Solutions. Their vehicles will also be available to see the mobile solution. See you there!
Agenda: 9:00 AM - 9:15 AM Introductions and Breakfast
9:15 AM - 9:45 AM Company Overview, Value of Integration
9:45 AM - 10:15 AM Records Management, Property/Evidence and Crash
10:15 AM - 10:30 AM Break
10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Computer-Aided Dispatch
11:00 AM - 11:30 AM Mobile
11:30 AM - 12:00 PM Department Tour / Questions & Answers
Need Directions? http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&rls=com.microsoft:en-us:IE-SearchBox&rlz=1I7RNRN_en&q=Gahanna+Division+of+Police,+460+Rocky+Fork+Blvd.Gahanna,+OH+43230&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.&biw=1073&bih=804&wrapid=tlif131412602161610&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=N&tab=wl
460 Rocky Fork Blvd. Gahanna, OH 43230
Questions? Contact Regional Sales Manager John Kitsmiller (512) 809-6763 john.kitsmiller@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
